title: what we need more of is elks
content:
Hey everyone, Let's go camping!!!

Update: Here's what people are saying about Camping:

  • "I'd rather code a Commodore-64 iPhoto clone in Quickbasic than write another web app without Camping!"
  • "Camping is my first choice when it comes to web frameworks that I could potentially write out on a cocktail napkin."
  • "Interesting."

Update: Went Camping.
